posts.post_content:
It just finally clicked:
  
   
Transform is more than just what has been stated already. It's also 'Level up- Innistrad Style'.
  
   
This makes me think we won't maybe see either Level up or Transform become common things exactly as they are, but that the idea behind them is going to be used repeatedly in future sets.
posts.html:
